title: upcomingdao
author: upcomingdao
content: There have been major breaking headlines from striking project growth rate to the major drop of most renowned cryptocurrencies. For a governance token like UPCG, the new project “Upcomings” comes with all its exceptional utilities and precise use cases. We may find it rather easy to see why people are anticipating a bright future irrespective to the cryptocurrency market.However, when the project offers novel features like a network utility, biased token system, bond pricing, Markets, P2P, and Dex evaluation and liquidity booting, we begin to see this concept as a game-changer in the digital sphere, similar to Solana and ApeCoin.Upcomings is a DAO platform with decentralized applications emphasizing on influential markets, Upcoming P2P and UPCG tokens. This new project is said to be community driven and future ready solution programme. You can now win free UPCG tokens by joining the Upcomings Bounty and Earning program. Just perform daily simple tasks and earn free UPCG tokens plus incredible rewards.It also features unique use cases, sorted token metrics, liquidity bootstrapping, yield farming, and Upcoming Token (UPCG) airdrop campaign that will present various NFT collections in future. Both the platform and members will be able to access the complete application to an extent providing users ease of interface and maybe an extra revenue stream for further coming marketplaces while boosting and supporting the user experience in exploring the entire metaverse.You can also add power to your portfolio using the native UPCG Token built for the purpose of governance and incentives. The team is building the strongest token economy incorporating largest of 1 million+ holders, active payment system and multiple use cases.This new project is looking for a group of Web 3-focused thinkers, creators, builders, and friends by placing forward basic [$1.00/user], gold [$10.00/user] and pro membership opportunity [$25.00/user] with exclusive feature and services. UPCG token offers a fixed supply of 20,000,000 [20 million] tokens with a high target launch on Q4, 2022.The breakdown of UPCG token allocation-· Team: 7%· Liquidity: 10%· Staking Reward: 20%· Product Development: 50%· Community Development: 3%· Investors:2%· Advisors: 1.5%· Contributors: 2%· Network Growth Fund: 2.25%· Backers: 2.25%Any user joining the Upcomings community can access Upcomings Markets- to track the price and data of diverse crypto with advanced showcasing charts and analytics. This is an utmost option to stay intact with the reality and price fluctuating markets.The Upcomings team is building strongest token economy to encompass a target of 1 million holders, active payment system along with some multiple use cases. Upcomings has plans to integrate multiple DApps like Dex, Markets, Decentralized P2P, Decentralized Chat, Launchpad, Web3 Games in order to increased token utility for better volume.We believe that the UPCG token will come with major opportunities analysing the demand and supply infrastructure. Also, Upcomings will be launching its products in an order, pacing up with the evolving trends.1. Decentralized Exchange- A user can easily swap tokens from the multi-chain network accessing high liquidity and low fees2. Markets- You can track price along with crucial crypto data presented with advanced charts and analytics.3. P2P- A user can perform crypto conversion within a decentralized way, saving time, and fees in a secure manner.4. Launchpad- The project offers crypto, web3, and NFT Verified ecosystem listing platform along with an incubator model5. Decentralized Charts- You can easily connect the wallet and chat with friends accessing a decentralized messaging model6. Web3 Games- Freely enjoy P2E fun games, making your experience more exciting.Upcomings project is all about 20 million | Total Supply, 50% | Development of platform and 6 products | Token Integration.The Upcomings community consist of major Enterprise validators, Edge node operators, promoters, designers, as well as the third-party developers. Being a community-driven incubator program ecosystem from crypto,Web3, and NFT projects, our team will soon release major applications and satisfying services based on the request and usage.Upcoming Token (UPCG) showcase a unique model where any user can access earnings. There are high benefits of its governance token support, all helping to ensure UPCG token stability with a supply algorithmically altered to control its price. Similar to other stablecoins, Upcomings tokens will be pegged to other assets. The neutral mechanism follows a different approach from regular tokens where stable-coins are backed by a reserve.The project also features staking and incentivizing pricing, where users will eventually increase the treasury of the UPCG platform. The user can consider this as an opportunity to pursue gains on the market and project can incentivize sales by attracting more users.Purchasing this token on different events like airdrop might guarantees a long-term benefit as the token value will eventually rise after the launch. Preferring this the user can enrich their wallet and bounce back after the ongoing crypto collapse. The project is on its launch, so this is a unique opportunity for you to get right into this project and grow with it from starting the ground up.website: http://www.upcomings.io/Twitter: https://twitter.com/UpcomingsDAOTelegram: https://t.me/UpcomingsDAODiscord: https://twitter.com/UpcomingsDAOReddit: https://www.reddit.com/user/myupcomingsFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/UpcomingsDAO/
